articles.author: Samantha Chery
articles.title: 1st Pacific Islander ‘American Idol’ winner Iam Tongi inspires Hawaiians - The Washington Post
articles.description: Iam Tongi, 18, is the first Hawaiian and Pacific Islander to win « American Idol, » which tends to favor country music singers.
articles.content:

Iam Tongi, a high-schooler whose guitar broke midway through the season, became the first Hawaiian and Pacific Islander to win American Idol, putting a national spotli… [+2900 chars]
